titles.title: To reinstate the eligibility of certain nonaccredited institutions of higher education for financial assistance under the Higher Education Act of 1965.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education and Training.

bill.summary: 6/8/1993--Introduced. Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to reinstate the eligibility of certain nonaccredited institutions of higher education for financial assistance programs.
